ygData.msgSnippet: A heartful laughter answers Rodimus. Ragnar had not expected this at all! In fact, he had not heard of dates since his time in the Ghost Bear technician caste.

A heartful laughter answers Rodimus. Ragnar had not expected this at 
all! In fact, he had not heard of dates since his time in the Ghost 
Bear technician caste.

Ragnar: Sorry, Rodimus, but I didn't expect that of you! I'm, er, I am 
coming over along with Windlord and Aerotaur. We will perform some 
patrolling before reporting in, so you take your time. Bear Alpha out, 
and have a good date!

--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
> : : Rodimus Prime : :
> 
> Ragnar's message came over the commlink. Rodimus sighed do to being 
interupted during a date.
> 
> Rodimus Prime: Excuse me for one moment, Nightlight.
> 
> Prime activates his commlink. He turns around and whispers back.
> 
> Rodimus Prime: I'm here Ragnar, but please be brief. I'm on a date.
